response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $800,000, but considering the current market conditions and my desire to find the right owner, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for quality and exclusivity. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
